translation: Ahli ktabv mnz yim lukh kạfr spdụ̄ byyh mshrk ạsụ̄nh tath vqts tam (kfr nishhi) alg spdn vạlụ̄ yot tam (nh) timn nishhi ttakarh thbvut yiyhi he.
(so dlyl) chih Allah tʿālyā sndi ṭrfh rsvl (ākhralzman ṣly Allah ʿlyh vslm) yim (timn pytth) pak vrqn hnz (yʿny qrānch) tlavt chih kran.
Yimn mnz drst th mstḥkm aḥkam (drj) chih.

(timn) ahli ktabn mnz avs nh (nby ākhralzman ṣly Allah ʿlyh vslmn hndis nbvts th rsalts pytth ayman anns byyh tihnz shani aqds prz navns mtʿlq godd) kanhh phvutt pyomut mgr aamhi pth zi yylhi (Muḥammad ṣly Allah ʿlyh vslmn hndi bʿthtch) ttakarh dlyl timn nishhi āyhi (pth ge tim panh vạnụ̄ tqsym kạnshi aon timn pytth ayman th kanhh spud ḥsd kh bạʿth mnkr th kạfr).

Ḥalankh timn avs ṣrf yohe ḥkm dinh āmut zi ṣrf tmụ̄ sndy khạṭr panun dyn khạlṣ krith krin Allah tʿālyā snz ʿbadt, (pth bạṭls nishhi byon spdith) krin ḥqs kun yksvuyy pạd byyhi krin nmaz qạyim byyhi diyn zkvāh th yohe chuh syod th mẓbvṭ dyn.
Be shk yim lukh ahli ktabv mnz kạfr spdụ̄byyhi mshrk (sạry) āsn jhnm kis nars mnz (pyth) tim chih hmyshh tthụ̄ mnz rvzn vạlụ̄, yimae lukh chih bdtryn mkhlvq.
Be shk yimav lukv ayman aon byyhi rvudụ̄ nyk ʿml kran timae lukh chih tmam mkhlvq khvth bhtr.

Tihund jza chuh tihindis rb snzi bargahi mnz hmyshh rvznkụ̄ bagh yimn bnụ̄ kinụ̄ kolh chhe pkan,tim rvzn yimn mnz hmyshh hmyshh,Allah tʿālyā chuh timn rạẓụ̄ gomut th tim lukh chih ts rạẓụ̄, yhi (mqam) chuh ts shkhṣs khạṭr yus pnnis rbs khvczan rvud.
